CTHULHUDARK.FailureRuleText: Cannot be used on Investigation Rolls or if success is needed for the scenario.
CTHULHUDARK.TryingAgainRuleText: If you include or included your Insight Die, You can reroll. Each reroll, may increase Insight. Reroll as much as you want.
CTHULHUDARK.CooperateRuleText: Everyone rolls. Keep the highest die rolled by anyone.
CTHULHUDARK.CompeteRuleText: Everyone who is competing rolls their dice. The highest die wins.
CTHULHUDARK.DoSomethingElseDialogDesc: When you do something other than investigating, roll:
CTHULHUDARK.DialogHumanDie: If the task is within human capabilities.
CTHULHUDARK.DialogOccupDie: If it’s within your occupational expertise.
CTHULHUDARK.DialogRiskDie: If you will risk your mind to succeed.
CTHULHUDARK.FailureRollContent: If your roll is higher than the other Investigator's highest die, they fail, just as you described. If not, they succeed as before.
CTHULHUDARK.RiskMoveMessage: The situation reveals some horror behind the universe, make an {insightroll}
CTHULHUDARK.InvestigateMaxDieMessage123: You get the bare minimum: if you need information to proceed with the scenario, you get it, but that’s all you get
CTHULHUDARK.InvestigateMaxDieMessage4: You get whatever a competent investigator would discover.
CTHULHUDARK.InvestigateMaxDieMessage6: You succeed brilliantly, get something extra, and may glimpse beyond human knowledge (and probably make an {insightroll}).
CTHULHUDARK.DoSomethingElseMaxDieMessage123: You get the bare minimum: if something needs to happen to proceed with the scenario, you get it, but that’s all you get.
CTHULHUDARK.DoSomethingElseMaxDieMessage5: You succeed well and may get something extra.
CTHULHUDARK.DoSomethingElseMaxDieMessage6: You succeed brilliantly, get something extra, but maybe more than you wanted (and probably make an {insightroll}).
CTHULHUDARK.InsightChatContent4: Your previous {insight} was {previousinsight}. You rolled higher, so your insight is now {newnsight}. Roleplay your fear.
CTHULHUDARK.InsightChatContent5:
Your previous {insight} was {previousinsight}. You rolled higher, so your insight is now {newnsight}. Roleplay your fear.
Note: You may now reduce your {insighttwo} by suppressing Mythos knowledge.
CTHULHUDARK.InsightChatContent6:
Your previous {insight} was {previousinsight}. You rolled higher, so your insight is now {newnsight}.
You go incurably insane. This is a special moment: everyone focusses on your character’s last moments as their mind breaks. Go out however you want: fight, scream, run or collapse.
CTHULHUDARK.InsightChatContent: Your current {insight} is {previousinsight}. You keep it together, just barely...
